Name: Kneeling Statue Offering Altar of Dhwty
Description: This statue represents a kneeling figure holding a little square altar, the top of which is hollow. It must have been a container for a removable object, probably an offering table. The statue represents the chief of the granaries and majordomo, or chief minister, of Amun-Re and Thoth. He lived during the reign of Tuthmosis the Third and the right shoulder of his statue is stamped with the cartouches of that king.
